pma:database.name: datingsite
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `users` ( `userID` int(11) NOT NULL, `username` tinytext NOT NULL, `password` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `email` text NOT NULL, `postnum` smallint(6) NOT NULL, `description` mediumtext NOT NULL, `pay` decimal(10,0) NOT NULL, `seeking` text NOT NULL, `picture` mediumblob NOT NULL COMMENT '15mb max' ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
